quotes.quote: Even the softest and sweetest heart was made by design for extreme battle.
Be soft, don't let the world make you hard. Be gentle, don't let the people make you difficult. Be kind, don't let the realities of life steal your sweetness and make you heartless.
Softness of smile indicates softness of character.
Having a soft heart in a cruel world is courage not weakness.
There is no pillow as soft as a clear conscience.
The soft heart is not a thing to harden but a treasure to protect. For soft hearts extend mercy, compassion, refuge, and God's redemption to the world.
Softness is not weakness. It takes courage to stay delicate in a world this cruel.
Be soft, even if you stand to get squashed.
Soft and kind hearted people are not fools. They know what people did to them, but they forgive again and again because they have beautiful hearts.
Be soft for the sake of every hard heart; show them with every movement of your body that gentle does not mean weak.
Power of softness and kindness are the greatest.
Being both soft and hard is a combination very few have mastered.
Soft nature of a person does not mean weakness. Remember, nothing is softer than water, but its force can break the strongest of rocks.
